TopicTitle: How to make your own missions for Mission Controller Plugin

Articles.Content:
Hey there,

I have been working on my own mission pack for the Mission Controller Plugin and decided to start making a tutorial series so everyone should be able to do it.

Beforehand i want to explain that i am not even close of being an professional coder, which makes making a own mission pack available for everyone.

Feedback is highly appreciated and ofcourse if you like the video and like to be updated on new uploads, please subscribe

http://youtu.be/n06bj6t6Io8

Interesting, is there an API for the used language to be found somewhere?

Btw, did you forget the closing curly brace for the MissionPackage entry codeblock or isn't that needed. ;-)

Greets,

Jan

Never mind, found the API - sort of -, a link for completeness added here.

Greets,

Jan
